Subject: Re: An Attempt to Escape...
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Through the exit Condor could notice many other cells like the one he had
just been in. The lights in the cooridor were dimmer now. To the far end of
the right corridor there was a large steel door, with a computer counsoul,
on it, and to the left, the cooridor turned a corner. Overhead there was an
airvent.
